member.name: REBARINFO
member.summary: Contains information that describes rebar control characteristics.

member.name: REBARINFO.cbSize
member.summary: Size of this structure, in bytes. Your application must fill this member before sending any messages that use the address of this structure as a parameter.

summary.para: Flag values that describe characteristics of the rebar control. Currently, rebar controls support only one value:

listheader.description: The himl member is valid or must be filled.

member.name: REBARINFO.himl
member.summary: Handle to an image list. The rebar control will use the specified image list to obtain images.
